
sudo chmod o+rw /dev/ttyUSB0
stty -F /dev/ttyUSB0 38400
cat /dev/ttyUSB0     <-- Blank because it is not ASCII
hexdump /dev/ttyUSB0 <-- Works but hard to read (no color)
xxd /dev/ttyUSB0     <-- Works and Easier to Read

Using watch_vautow.py:
  port = /dev/ttyUSB0
  baud = 38400

RS485 Protcol Encoding in bytes:
  01  Frame Start
  Tx  Sender ID (VAUTOW is 11)
  Rx  Receiver ID (ERV is 10)
  01  ??? All frames have 01 here
  LL  Message Length in Bytes (i.e. 03)
  MM  Message in Bytes (i.e. 3 bytes of message)
  MM
  MM
  CS  16-bit CRC Check Sum
  04  Frame End

Packet Decoding in Python:
  start    = frame.hex()[0:2]
  sender   = frame.hex()[2:4]
  receiver = frame.hex()[4:6]
  unknown  = frame.hex()[6:8]  <-- Always 01
  length   = frame.hex()[8:10]
  message  = frame.hex()[10:10+int(length,16)*2]
  crc      = frame.hex()[-4:-2]
  end      = frame.hex()[-2:]

~3.5 milliseconds between each call and response frame

VAUTO-to-ERV Call/Response...
01 11 10 010104d904
01 10 11 010105d804

ERV-to-VAUTOW Call/Response...
01 10 11 010104d904
01 11 10 010105d804

... every ~18 milliseconds

ERV-to-VAUTOW Call/Response every 3 seconds:
011011011d2002200c210a220f2200300230002217000e500f500a500b50082206229604
0111100154210f5004

VAUTOW Timing/Counter packet every 10 seconds:
01 11 10 01 08 21140004tttt0x00 CS 04

ERV-to-VAUTOW Call/Response every ~300 seconds:
011011011f20140002200c210a220f2200300230002217000e500f500a500b50082206228004
011110015b210f5004

The short response above is the only one that doesn't match the encoding:
01111001 5b 210f 50 04 <-- LL is 5b which would be 91 bytes / int('5b',16)

STB, Auto Off, and Turbo Off are identical packets (all go to Standby)
Control packets are exactly the same every time

REC - VAUTOW one click:
0110110104400320007704
01111001034103207704
011011010540002001067204
01111001034100207a04
01101101032001209a04
011110010521012001069004

INT - VAUTOW INT:
011011010b40032000022204b004
011110010541022203205104
011011010540002001087004
01111001034100207a04
01101101032001209a04
011110010521012001088e04

MIN - VAUTOW MIN:
0110110104400320007704
01111001034103207704
011011010540002001096f04
01111001034100207a04
01101101032001209a04
011110010521012001098d04

MED - VAUTOW MED:
0110110112400320000822049a99e3420622049a99e3425f04
0111100107410822062203202104
0110110105400020010b6d04
01111001034100207a04
01101101032001209a04
0111100105210120010b8b04

MAX - VAUTOW MAX:
0110110104400320007704
01111001034103207704
0110110105400020010a6e04
01111001034100207a04
01101101032001209a04
0111100105210120010a8c04

STB - VAUTO last click:
0110110104400320007704
01111001034103207704
011011010540002001017704
01111001034100207a04
01101101032001209a04
011110010521012001019504

TUR - VAUTOW Turbo On:
01101101084000220440380000f804
01111001034100227804
0110110105400020010c6c04
01111001034100207a04
01101101032001209a04
0111100105210120010c8a04

TUR - VAUTOW Turbo Off:
0110110104400320007704
01111001034103207704
011011010540002001017704
01111001034100207a04
01101101032001209a04
011110010521012001019504

AUT - VAUTOW Auto On:
0110110104400320007704
01111001034103207704
011011010540002001106804
01111001034100207a04
01101101032001209a04
011110010521012001108604

AUT - VAUTOW Auto Off:
0110110104400320007704
01111001034103207704
011011010540002001017704
01111001034100207a04
01101101032001209a04
011110010521012001019504
